::Feline::
She had an intersting idea.  If Zardus could program the femmebot to 
be loyal and serve him, perhaps Zardus could program Battera, 
CyberShark and HotRod to serve him as well.  She called HotRod on her 
link, "Hey, Handsome, could you stop in at CR lab for a second 
please?" she said with a soft purr in her voice.
